name: Bulwarks of Esteria
description:
Journey the  land of Esteria , where mystical creatures and ancient magics are always trying to wreck havoc.  Join a Gunslinger,  a  wizards, rogue and a cleric  as they   accept a contract to retrieve an ancient scroll wit the power to bring people back from the dead. When they are arrive at its resting place they find their quest isn't what they expected. 

When the group discovers a stunning secret their lives might never be the same.
